text: Griffis or Griffiss is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Elliot Griffis, composer *William Elliot Griffis, orientalist *Townsend Griffiss, aviator ==See also== *16253 Griffis, asteroid *Griffiss International Airport, in Rome, New York *Griffis Sculpture Park, in Cattaraugus County, New York
title: Griffis
